title: Lifesteal
body: Is there a max lifesteal? I wanna try a Yi Damage/Lifesteal build instead of the usual crit build.

replies.body: There isn't a max lifesteal beyond what you can actually build, but the issue with high lifesteal builds is that they keep you alive only so long as you can attack. Which means that as soon as you get stunned, you're dead. This makes them very, very unattractive to all but the safest champions.
